Something I have observed repeatedly, but I dunno if I mentioned it
before: often an attempt to launch after a failed build also fails,
but only once. What I mean:

If, after the previous scenario, I then run previous devspace (C-F11),
I get an additional error in .log (and in the Problems view): see
final error

> An internal error occurred during: "Launching keepThisBlank on 1.4.2".

However, if I just hit C-F11 again, I launch normally.

Here's a clue I discovered.  I (and Tom, too, I believe) use the JET support in
org.eclipse.emf.codegen to generate Java classes for various things.  Lately,
we've been having a problem with it such that JET regenerates some of the classes
at every opportunity.  And, in fact, during a "Rebuild all" I could see JET
recompilation messages flashing past in the dialog.  Getting suspicious, I
exited my workbench, disabled plugin org.eclipse.emf.codegen (renamed its
plugin.xml to plugin.xml.off), retarted my workbench, did a "Rebuild all", and,
voila, no
problem.  So, perhaps the JET builder/compiler re-writing a few .java files during
the build is a trigger of this problem.

Hmmm ... FWIW we have an old bug (claimed fixed, but I am dubious)

You can reproduce this by the following:

Simply try to build the Hyades plugins from CVS. I'm using the workbench, which 
includes M7, as well as EMF (including XSD runtime) and GEF. These are required 
to build Hyades. Then, connect to dev.eclipse.org /home/tools, check out:

org.apache.jakarta_oro
org.eclipse.hyades.*

You can skip all the *-feature, nl1, and nls1 plugins. If you get a problem 
building org.eclipse.hyades.logging.java14, try PDE Tools-> Update classpath. 
If you don't get any errors, try rebuild all. It happens every time for me.

Note: This appears to be JET-related. If I turn it off, it works fine.
*** Bug 52504 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 52670 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Yes I'm using JET too! Can this be turned into a high priority. And work with
the EMF group. It's getting unusable for me. Once it gets into this mode every
save causes me to be interupted because of this. Even periodically with no saves
some build is kicked off and the error occurs. The progress view pops open,
focus is stolen from editor. I have click on something else and then back to the
editor to focus back into the editor. Meanwhile what I was typing is lost. I
have to close the session and then reopen it again. But shortly thereafter it
starts happening again.

Thanks,Rich

The JET builder is attempting a re-entrant build:

JETBuilder.build calls JETCompileTemplateOperation.run, which calls IProject.build.

We have guard code in BuildManager to prevent this, but one of the build methods
puts this guard inside the try/finally that cleans up the build manager's
temporary state, so this ends up killing the outer build that is going on. I
have fixed up the code in BuildManager, but the JETBuilder really shouldn't be
trying to build from within a builder.

Moving to EMF for further action.  The NPE should no longer happen as of 3.0 M8,
but the JETBuilder should also be fixed.
This will be fixed in the next drop (later this week).
This should be fixed in the 20040225_1234SL drop.
